verses.verse: Observe <WH8104> <WH8800> the month <WH2320> of Abib <WH24>, and keep <WH6213> <WH8804> the passover <WH6453> unto the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>: for in the month <WH2320> of Abib <WH24> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> brought thee forth <WH3318> <WH8689> out of Egypt <WH4714> by night <WH3915>.

Thou shalt therefore sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8804> the passover <WH6453> unto the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, of the flock <WH6629> and the herd <WH1241>, in the place <WH4725> which the YY <WH3068> shall choose <WH977> <WH8799> to place <WH7931> <WH8763> his name <WH8034> there.

Thou shalt eat <WH398> <WH8799> no leavened bread <WH2557> with it; seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> shalt thou eat <WH398> <WH8799> matzah <WH4682> therewith, even the bread <WH3899> of affliction <WH6040>; for thou camest forth <WH3318> <WH8804> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> in haste <WH2649>: that thou mayest remember <WH2142> <WH8799> the day <WH3117> when thou camest forth <WH3318> <WH8800> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> all the days <WH3117> of thy life <WH2416>.

And there shall be no leavened bread <WH7603> seen <WH7200> <WH8735> with thee in all thy coast <WH1366> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>; neither shall there any thing of the flesh <WH1320>, which thou sacrificedst <WH2076> <WH8799> the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> at even <WH6153>, remain <WH3885> <WH8799> all night until the morning <WH1242>.
Thou mayest <WH3201> <WH8799> not sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8800> the passover <WH6453> within any <WH259> of thy gates <WH8179>, which the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> thee:

But at the place <WH4725> which the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> shall choose <WH977> <WH8799> to place <WH7931> <WH8763> his name <WH8034> in, there thou shalt sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8799> the passover <WH6453> at even <WH6153>, at the going down <WH935> <WH8800> of the sun <WH8121>, at the season <WH4150> that thou camest forth <WH3318> <WH8800> out of Egypt <WH4714>.

And thou shalt roast <WH1310> <WH8765> and eat <WH398> <WH8804> it in the place <WH4725> which the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> shall choose <WH977> <WH8799>: and thou shalt turn <WH6437> <WH8804> in the morning <WH1242>, and go <WH1980> <WH8804> unto thy tents <WH168>.

Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> thou shalt eat <WH398> <WH8799> matzah <WH4682>: and on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> shall be a solemn assembly <WH6116> to the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>: thou shalt do <WH6213> <WH8799> no work <WH4399> therein.

Seven <WH7651> weeks <WH7620> shalt thou number <WH5608> <WH8799> unto thee: begin <WH2490> <WH8687> to number <WH5608> <WH8800> the seven <WH7651> weeks <WH7620> from such time as thou beginnest <WH2490> <WH8686> to put the sickle <WH2770> to the corn <WH7054>.

And thou shalt keep <WH6213> <WH8804> the feast <WH2282> of weeks <WH7620> unto the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> with a tribute <WH4530> of a freewill offering <WH5071> of thine hand <WH3027>, which thou shalt give <WH5414> <WH8799> unto the YY thy 'Elohim, according as the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> hath blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> thee:

And thou shalt rejoice <WH8055> <WH8804> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, thou, and thy son <WH1121>, and thy daughter <WH1323>, and thy manservant <WH5650>, and thy maidservant <WH519>, and the Levi <WH3881> that is within thy gates <WH8179>, and the stranger <WH1616>, and the fatherless <WH3490>, and the widow <WH490>, that are among <WH7130> you, in the place <WH4725> which the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> hath chosen <WH977> <WH8799> to place <WH7931> <WH8763> his name <WH8034> there.
And thou shalt remember <WH2142> <WH8804> that thou wast a bondman <WH5650> in Egypt <WH4714>: and thou shalt observe <WH8104> <WH8804> and do <WH6213> <WH8804> these statutes <WH2706>.

Thou shalt observe <WH6213> <WH8799> the feast <WH2282> of tabernacles <WH5521> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>, after that thou hast gathered <WH622> <WH8800> in thy corn <WH1637> and thy wine <WH3342>:

And thou shalt rejoice <WH8055> <WH8804> in thy feast <WH2282>, thou, and thy son <WH1121>, and thy daughter <WH1323>, and thy manservant <WH5650>, and thy maidservant <WH519>, and the Levi <WH3881>, the stranger <WH1616>, and the fatherless <WH3490>, and the widow <WH490>, that are within thy gates <WH8179>.

Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> shalt thou keep a solemn feast <WH2287> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> in the place <WH4725> which the YY <WH3068> shall choose <WH977> <WH8799>: because the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> shall bless <WH1288> <WH8762> thee in all thine increase <WH8393>, and in all the works <WH4639> of thine hands <WH3027>, therefore thou shalt surely rejoice <WH8056>.

Three <WH7969> times <WH6471> in a year <WH8141> shall all thy males <WH2138> appear <WH7200> <WH8735> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> in the place <WH4725> which he shall choose <WH977> <WH8799>; in the feast <WH2282> of matzah <WH4682>, and in the feast <WH2282> of weeks <WH7620>, and in the feast <WH2282> of tabernacles <WH5521>: and they shall not appear <WH7200> <WH8735> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> empty <WH7387>:
Havahry man <WH376> shall give as he is able <WH4979> <WH3027>, according to the b'rakhah <WH1293> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> which he hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> thee.

Judges <WH8199> <WH8802> and officers <WH7860> <WH8802> shalt thou make <WH5414> <WH8799> thee in all thy gates <WH8179>, which the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> thee, throughout thy tribes <WH7626>: and they shall judge <WH8199> <WH8804> the people <WH5971> with just <WH6664> judgment <WH4941>.

Thou shalt not wrest <WH5186> <WH8686> judgment <WH4941>; thou shalt not respect <WH5234> <WH8686> persons <WH6440>, neither take <WH3947> <WH8799> a gift <WH7810>: for a gift <WH7810> doth blind <WH5786> <WH8762> the eyes <WH5869> of the wise <WH2450>, and pervert <WH5557> <WH8762> the words <WH1697> of the righteous <WH6662>.

That which is altogether <WH6664> just <WH6664> shalt thou follow <WH7291> <WH8799>, that thou mayest live <WH2421> <WH8799>, and inherit <WH3423> <WH8804> the land <WH776> which the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> thee.

Thou shalt not plant <WH5193> <WH8799> thee a grove <WH842> of any trees <WH6086> near unto <WH681> the altar <WH4196> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, which thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8799> thee.
Neither shalt thou set thee up <WH6965> <WH8686> any image <WH4676>; which the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> hateth <WH8130> <WH8804>.
